title: Alpha Series: Alpha Jasper
description: A journey of self-discovery, of rescue, of loss, of new hope for a brighter tomorrow. A journey full of magic and dangers. A journey of love.  “Phantom wolves don’t exist!”  Thea belongs to the Devotion Pack; a community now reduced to a mere decrepit village after its Alpha went missing centuries ago.  Dark stories of the Devotion pack’s haunting from the terrifying undead Phantom Wolves have circulated for years but Thea had never believed the rumours. That is until she met Jasper; the confident and magical missing Alpha of the pack and newly reincarnated Phantom Wolf. He also happens to be her destined mate.  But as Fate would have it, Thea and Jasper’s newly-found love is struck by misfortune when Thea gets poisoned by the Desire Pack. Will their love end in a tragic twist, or will they find a way to save Thea from her deadly fate?   If only she possessed the magic of a Phantom Wolf...
author: Midika Crane
